text: Robert Edward "Solly" Solinger (December 23, 1925 – December 10, 2014) was a Canadian professional ice hockey player. he played 99 games in the National Hockey League. Solinger was born in Star City, Saskatchewan. He played for the Toronto Maple Leafs and Detroit Red Wings. Solinger died in Edmonton, Alberta, aged 88, on December 10, 2014.Obituary: Robert Edward Solinger ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1925 births Category:2014 deaths Category:Cleveland Barons (1937–1973) players Category:Detroit Red Wings players Category:Hershey Bears players Category:Ice hockey people from Saskatchewan Category:Pittsburgh Hornets players Category:Toronto Maple Leafs players
title: Bob Solinger
